description: This Ziarat is recited for Imam Hussain(as)(ajtfs) on the day of Ashura & everyday. Highly Recommended for solutions to all major problems, if recited continiously for 40 days

Salutation on Imam Hussain(as) by Imam Mahdi(ajtfs). Of the several prescribed Ziyarat of Imam al-Husain (as), one was recited by Imam al-Mahdi(ATFS) and reached us through one of his four special deputies.
